thread.title: A Gunman Stormed An Istanbul Nightclub During New Year’s Eve Celebrations, Killing Dozens Of People
thread.title_full: A Gunman Stormed An Istanbul Nightclub During New Year’s Eve Celebrations, Killing Dozens Of People

author: Kimberly Ricci
title: A Gunman Stormed An Istanbul Nightclub During New Year’s Eve Celebrations, Killing Dozens Of People
text:
JUST IN: An armed attack has taken place at a nightclub in Istanbul, according to state-run news agency https://t.co/AFuL4FnZn3 pic.twitter.com/vbshCsFGXj 
— CNN (@CNN) January 1, 2017 
In Turkey, New Year’s Eve celebrations became the scene of violence with an armed attack in an Istanbul nightclub. This CNN video reports initial details about the incident, which saw at least one gunman (possibly more) open fire. CNN also notes that this area of Istanbul (the Ortakoy district) was already the scene of a significant police presence before the attack occurred.
The Guardian reveals at least 35 casualties , according to state media. Half a dozen ambulances immediately swarmed the scene, although details are continuing to unfold. 
We will update this post as more information becomes available.
Ongoing violence and terror attacks in Turkey were punctuated earlier this month by the murder of a Russian ambassador by an off-duty Turkish cop. Police later arrested a screaming gunman outside the U.S. embassy in the Turkish capital of Ankara.
This attack follows other high-profile incidents of violence that source to terrorism, including a truck that plowed into a Christmas market in Berlin . Authorities in Australia also foiled a large-scale attack in Melbourne that was planned for Christmas Day.
(Via CNN & The Guardian )
